title: Anyone try the record function of Replays yet?
body:
I just did a little test snipit, it looks like it could be okay, but it just gives you a video file in your "highlights" folder of your League of Legends documents folder. if you have okay editing software it could be usable, and it also makes it so you don't have to record while playing.

I'm no video editor by any means, but it looks like an okay way to share replay footage with a little bit of effort.

what are some more knowledgeable people's opinion on what Riot has actually given us? is there any real reason to prefer it over the traditional recording methods? I tend  to think all of what Riot does tends to be outclassed, but this feature seems usable for even the more advanced replay video makers.

tl;dr I am dumb, tell me if it is good/bad and why
